name: AI-Powered Chest Cancer Detection
desc: This project showcases a full-stack AI solution for chest cancer detection using deep learning and MLOps. It integrates MLflow, DVC, CI/CD, and AWS into a scalable pipeline, visualized through a diagnostic X-ray image.

name: USA Visa Prediction
desc: This project uses machine learning to streamline visa applicant shortlisting, helping U.S. employers manage high volumes of job certification requests efficiently.

name: AIDoctor: Medical Care through Gen AI Tech
desc: AIDoctor is a cutting-edge platform leveraging generative AI to enhance medical care delivery, providing personalized treatment recommendations and streamlining patient management.

name: Real-time Waste Detection System
desc: This project implements a real-time waste detection system using computer vision techniques to identify and classify waste materials.
